name: World of the Hidden Folk
description:
Your memories have been stolen! Follow the trail into the world of the Hidden Folk and go on a journey of Self Reflection and Exploration.

Retrieve your memories and explore the world, use your memories to tap into solutions to obstacles while connecting with the core of who you are. 

World of the Hidden Folk is the prequel to my current project, 'Legend of the Hidden Folk'. It is a fantasy themed narrative game, created on the Story Synth platform. Click the download button to head straight to the game, and start your playthrough.
